name: Marlena Neely
coverLetter:
I have been around Marijuana my whole life, I have been trimming for roughly 15 years and have prior experience working with Humboldt Legends breaking down, trimming, packaging, and stuffing prerolls. I also have experience using Rick Simspons Phoenix Tears oil to kick my stage 3 rectal cancer into remission three years ago and am still in remission. I am just looking for work no food or shelter thanks!
Depending on the size required, dryness and size of buds I can trim around 2lbs daily.
